**Problem 1**
```{r collapse = TRUE}
data("instacart")
```

1. 1. How many aisles are there, and which aisles are the most items ordered from?
```{r}
aisle_obs = 
  instacart %>%
  group_by(aisle) %>% 
  summarize(n_obs = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n_obs))

knitr::kable(aisle_obs)
```
 - There are `r nrow(aisle_obs)`in the dataset. Since `r aisle_obs[1,2]` is the largest observations of aisle, fresh vegetables is the aisle that the most items ordered from.
